rows.description: Advertising revenue in the Family of Apps segment is generated by displaying ad products on Facebook, Instagram, Messenger, and third-party mobile applications and websites, with marketers paying based on impressions delivered or user actions such as clicks.
Other revenue in the Family of Apps segment includes revenue sources other than advertising, but the specific components of this revenue line are not detailed in the provided information.

Reality Labs revenue is generated from the delivery of consumer hardware products, such as Meta Quest and Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses, and related software and content, including virtual, augmented, and mixed reality related consumer hardware, software, and content.
products_services: Meta Quest and Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses
